video_info.title: Indian Idol
video_info.shortDescription: Indian Idol 16 – “Yaadon Ki Playlist” celebrates music that brings back cherished memories and emotions. For the first time ever, auditions go outdoors, traveling across India to discover raw talent, hosted by the legendary Udit Narayan, while Aditya Narayan returns as the main host. The judges - Vishal Dadlani, Shreya Ghoshal, and Badshah - search for voices that touch hearts. A season where every song is a memory, and every melody tells a story.

The judges - Vishal Dadlani, Shreya Ghoshal, and Badshah - search for voices that touch hearts. A season where every song is a memory, and every melody tells a story.

video_info.title: Bundesliga 2025-26
video_info.shortDescription: Werder Bremen host Bundesliga leaders Bayern Munich at Weserstadion, desperate to end a five-game winless skid against a Bayern side. Bayern rout under Vincent Kompany, boast an unmatched 79:19 goal difference and 18 straight away wins over Bremen historically. Find out who comes on top? Catch all the action from Bundesliga 2025-26, LIVE on Sony LIV.
